page.title: 08Local Radio-Leeswood area
page.content: Two small radio stations serve the Leeswood area.These are Radio Clwyd which broadcasts from Mold,and Marcher Sound which broadcasts from Gwersyllt. Marcher Sound is a commercial station whereas Radio Clwyd isn't. However it does inform listeners of jumble sales & school fairs etc. They both have news broadcasts. Although these companies operate mainly in the area, they have listeners all over N.Wales. These companies get about 10,000 listeners. Sometimes when schools close due to snow the media broadcasts tell everyone which schools are open.
